outline:
1. to seize, contain, measure
    1. (Qal) to measure, calculate
    2. (Pilpel) to sustain, maintain, contain
      1. to sustain, support, nourish
      2. to contain, hold in, restrain
      3. to support, endure
    3. (Polpal) to be supplied
    4. (Hilpil) to contain, hold, hold in, endure
      1. to contain
      2. to sustain, endure
kjv_def: (be able to, can) abide, bear, comprehend, contain, feed, forbearing, guide, hold(-ing in), nourish(-er), be present, make provision, receive, sustain, provide sustenance (victuals).
strongs_def: properly, to keep in; hence, to measure; figuratively, to maintain (in various senses)
